applicant.name: Insurance Test Imports Ltd.
applicant.address: Commercial Plot 78, Tejgaon I/A, Dhaka-1208, Bangladesh

input.description_of_goods: Industrial Machinery and Equipment, CIF Value
required_documents: Insurance Certificate covering 95% of CIF value

_test_metadata.test_scenario: Insufficient insurance coverage for Bangladesh imports
_test_metadata.expected_failure: Insurance coverage below required 110% of CIF value
_test_metadata.business_impact: Risk of loss not adequately covered, may face banking issues

critical_failures.details: Insurance coverage of 95% is below required 110% of CIF value for Bangladesh imports
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Increase insurance coverage to minimum 110% of CIF value ($110,000)

critical_failures.details: Institute Cargo Clauses (B) provides limited coverage; (A) recommended for machinery
critical_failures.suggested_fix: Use Institute Cargo Clauses (A) for comprehensive coverage

warnings.details: Industrial machinery requires comprehensive insurance coverage including installation risks
warnings.suggested_fix: Consider additional coverage for installation and commissioning
